simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Support function for MM_LoadMemFromFileCmd. This routine will read a file and write the data to memory that is defined to only be 8 bit accessible

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: This function is specific to the optional #MM_MEM8 memory type

parameterdescription.para: The open file handle of the load file
A pointer to a character string holding the load file name
A #MM_LoadDumpFileHeader_t pointer to the load file header structure
The destination address for the requested load operation

entry.para: Returns TRUE if the load completed successfully
Returns FALSE if the load failed due to an error

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Support function for MM_DumpMemToFileCmd. This routine will read an address range that is defined to only be 8 bit accessible and store the data in a file

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: This function is specific to the optional #MM_MEM8 memory type

parameterdescription.para: The open file handle of the dump file
A pointer to a character string holding the dump file name
A #MM_LoadDumpFileHeader_t pointer to the dump file header structure initialized with data based upon the command message parameters

entry.para: Returns TRUE if the dump completed successfully
Returns FALSE if the dump failed due to an error

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Support function for MM_FillMemCmd. This routine will load memory that is defined to only be 8 bit accessible with a command specified fill pattern

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: This function is specific to the optional #MM_MEM8 memory type

parameterdescription.para: The destination address for the fill operation
A #MM_FillMemCmd_t pointer to the fill command message
